articles.title: Elon Musk On "Tough" Last 3 Months, Saving Twitter From Going Bankrupt - NDTV
articles.description: Twitter and Tesla CEO Elon Musk on Sunday said that the past three months have been "extremely tough" as he "had to save Twitter from bankruptcy" while also fulfilling his duties in Tesla and SpaceX.
